RouteRdRtGrp.description: A grouping for a route's route distinguishers and route targets

rdRt.description: A list of route distinguishers and corresponding VPN route targets

bestpath.description: Indicate this path is the best path

MplsLabelStack.description:
This grouping specifies an MPLS label stack.  The label
stack is encoded as a list of label stack entries.  The
list key is an identifier that indicates the relative
ordering of each entry, with the lowest-value identifier
corresponding to the top of the label stack.

mplsLabelStack.description: Container for a list of MPLS label stack entries.

id.description:
Identifies the entry in a sequence of MPLS label
stack entries.  An entry with a smaller identifier
value precedes an entry with a larger identifier
value in the label stack.  The value of this ID has
no semantic meaning other than relative ordering
and referencing the entry.

entry.description: List of MPLS label stack entries.

VpnRouteTargets.description:
A grouping that specifies Route Target import-export rules
used in BGP-enabled VPNs.

routeTargetType.description: Import/export type of the Route Target.

macAgingTimer.description: mac-aging-timer, the duration after whicha MAC entry is considered aged out

EndpointGrp.description: A grouping that defines the structure of an endpoint

acOrPwOrRedundancyGrp.description: A choice ofattachment circuit or pseudowire or redundancy group

revertDelay.description: amount ot time to wait to revert to primary

rerouteDelay.description: amount of time to delay reroute

revert.description: allow forwarding to revert to primary after restoring primary

dualReceive.description: allow extra traffic to be carried by backup
